'''''Surpassing the Ancients' Wisdom''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Ruin Serpent]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].
